attributes.action: Have York Hospital treat Mr. Terry Donohue immeadiately and stop the decline in his health
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Re failed e-petition.
Strange how the government can say

Outside the remit or powers of the Prime Minister and Government

I thought the government was in charge of the NHS
We will have to start a traditional petition.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
